section.name: Modules
section.p:
Querydsl is based on various modules with different purposes. The modules are
querydsl-core with the basic constructs used in various query language specific versions of the API
querydsl-annotations with Java annotations for domain and DTO types
querydsl-apt for code generation via APT
querydsl-hql as a fluent API for Hibernate HQL
querydsl-sql as a fluent API for SQL
